Chauncey Billups

Chauncey Ray Billups ▪ Twitter: 1MrBigShot

(Mr. Big Shot, Smooth)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-3, 202lb (190cm, 91kg)

Born: September 25, 1976 in Denver, Colorado us

College: Colorado

High School: George Washington in Denver, Colorado

Draft: Boston Celtics, 1st round (3rd pick, 3rd overall), 1997 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 31, 1997

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2024 (Full List)

Career Length: 17 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Chauncey Billups?

Chauncey Billups is 47 years old.

Where was Chauncey Billups born?

Chauncey Billups was born in Denver, Colorado.

When was Chauncey Billups born?

Chauncey Billups was born on September 25, 1976.

How tall is Chauncey Billups?

Chauncey Billups is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much did Chauncey Billups weigh when playing?

Chauncey Billups weighed 202 lbs (91 kg) when playing.

Is Chauncey Billups in the Hall of Fame?

Chauncey Billups was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2024 (Full List) .

When was Chauncey Billups drafted?

Chauncey Billups was drafted by Boston Celtics, 1st round (3rd pick, 3rd overall), 1997 NBA Draft.

What position did Chauncey Billups play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

When did Chauncey Billups retire?

Chauncey Billups last played in 2014.

What is Chauncey Billups' net worth?

Chauncey Billups made at least $107,227,720 playing professional basketball.

How much did Chauncey Billups make?

Chauncey Billups made $13,150,000 in 2011.

What did Chauncey Billups average?

Chauncey Billups averaged 15.2 points, 2.9 rebounds, and 5.4 assists per game.

How many rings does Chauncey Billups have?

Chauncey Billups won one championship.

What is Chauncey Billups' Twitter account?

Chauncey Billups is on Twitter at 1MrBigShot.

What schools did Chauncey Billups attend?

Chauncey Billups attended George Washington in Denver, Colorado and Colorado.

What are Chauncey Billups' nicknames?

Mr. Big Shot, Smooth are nicknames for Chauncey Billups.
